sentences.en: After she paid the bill, she placed the receipt in her wallet.
sentences.cn: 她付了款之后把收据放进皮夹子里.

sentences.en: At Brussels airport he fell victim to pickpockets who pinched his wallet.
sentences.cn: 在布鲁塞尔机场，他被扒手盯上，钱包被偷走了。

sentences.en: He took a credit card out of his wallet.
sentences.cn: 他从钱包里拿出一张信用卡。

sentences.en: He took out his fat wallet and peeled off some notes.
sentences.cn: 他掏出鼓鼓的钱包，抽出几张钞票。

sentences.en: He tried to tell me a lie about losing his wallet.
sentences.cn: 他试图使我相信他丢失了钱夹的谎言.

sentences.en: He was dismayed when he found his wallet gone.
sentences.cn: 他发现丢了钱包而惊慌失措.

sentences.en: I felt for my wallet and papers in my inside pocket.
sentences.cn: 我在里兜里摸钱包和证件。

sentences.en: I got out my wallet and began to dole out the money.
I slid the wallet into his pocket.
sentences.cn: 我把钱包麻利地塞进了他的口袋。

sentences.en: It is terrible that she lost her wallet.
Peter took out his wallet and showed his ID to the man.
sentences.cn: 彼得掏出钱包向那人出示他的身份证件。

sentences.en: Someone has stolen my wallet from my back pocket.
sentences.cn: 有人从我的后口袋偷走了皮夹子.

sentences.en: The men rifled through his clothing and snatched the wallet.
sentences.cn: 那些人匆匆翻了翻他的衣服，然后一把抢走了钱包。

sentences.en: They knocked me down and robbed me of my wallet.
sentences.cn: 他们将我击倒并抢走了我的钱包.

sentences.en: You'll have to go to the police station to reclaim your wallet.
sentences.cn: 你得到警察局去认领你的钱包。

trans.tran_en: a small flat case, often made of leather, that you carry in your pocket, for holding paper money, bank cards etc
